name: Combine-aroids
description:
DISCLAMER. Read the description before playing Combine-aroids.

Combine-aroids is a asteroids like game with a twist.

The asteroids have to combine in order to explode.

You control the Tri-Ship-1 who has to survive as long as It can.

Avoid the Combine-aroids and let them combine on their own.

Controls:

Press the left or right arrow key to

rotate left and right respectively.

Press the Up arrow key to move in the direction you are facing.

Instructions:

The circle in the middle is The Portal.

Combine-aroids will spawn from the portal.

If you touch a Combine-Aroid, you lose one health.

Lose all of your health and you die.

Circles with triangles on them are health pods. Touch them to gain one health.

And make sure to have fun. 😄 😄 😄
